answers.answer: Don't worry too much about it. I've had to do the 3 hour test 3 times and it always went just fine with no gestational diabetes.  I hope yours turns out well,  too.
Make sure you eat breakfast. 2eggs and toast at least. So you won't pass out. That's what I did
Thanks, but they said I have to fast;( I thought it was bad enough last week, now I have to go 3hrs w/o eating.
I have to do mine 3 hrs tomorrow!!!! ; (

Fast and do the test early in the morning.I fasted 12-14 hours last Thursday for my 3 hour test and is still waiting for my result. Hopefully they want call me tomorrow or else that means I failed. ://

question: I'm having twins and went for glucose test last Wednesday. The OB office called me today to tell me it was high. Now I have to go back for another test, but this one is 3 hrs! This will be babies 4 and 5 for me plus I'm 35. Trying not to freak out;(
title: Glucose test high!
